entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ProducesResponseType should support setting a Description #54064
  • Blazor generic component with CascadingParameter does not update displayed value, even when the value changes in code #54063
  • init setter to have the same visibility as the most visible constructor, rather than the containing type #54059
  • Blazor 8 reverse proxy signin-oidc not working. #54057
  • GetUriByAction without HttpContext cannot be used normally. #54054
  • Expose client identity when leveraging Kestrel for IPC over named pipes or *nix domain sockets. #54053
  • Why is UUID performance slightly worse than other frameworks? #54050

Closed

  • .NET 8 Blazor - Form With Multiple Buttons Inconsistent Behavior #53993
  • [DataProtection] Hang at application start when trying to get DataProtection key from Azure KeyVault #53989
  • How to configure .NET 8 AspNetCore Identity with Active Directory Federation Services (ADFS) as external provider using OpenIdConnect #52913
  • Error while setting render mode on Generic Blazor Component #54058
  • Only submit 1 AntiforgeryToken in Blazor SSR mode #54022
  • .NET 8 Blazor - OnChange() Migration To Static Rendering #54018
  • [Blazor Hybrid] Mouse does not work on the Second Monitor #54052
  • HttpContext.AuthenticateAsync do not return "sub" claim after update to .NET 8 #52940

PullRequests

Created

  • Add option to serve WebAssembly app with multithreading #54062
    area-blazor
  • [Infrastructure] Fix NPM packaging #54056
    area-signalr

Merged

  • [Infrastructure] Avoid downloading browsers during source build #54036
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Update OAuthTokenResponse.cs #53763
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
